citations.narrative:
At the time of the inspection an approximate 1000 foot section of perimeter fencing along the north and west sides of the
property was incomplete. The installation of the perimeter fence where two greater grisons are housed was delayed due
to a fencing equipment malfunction. The absence of a complete perimeter fence poses a safety risk as unwanted animals
and unauthorized persons may have contact with the greater grisons which could result in injury or disease transmission
to the regulated animals.
Correct by November 12, 2024 by completing the installation of a minimum 6-foot perimeter fence that is distanced at
least 3 feet from the greater grison primary enclosure or obtain a perimeter fencing variance from the USDA
Administrator.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.127(d) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
At the time of the inspection an approximate 1000 foot section of perimeter fencing along the north and west sides of the 
property was incomplete. The installation of the perimeter fence where two greater grisons are housed was delayed due 
to a fencing equipment malfunction. The absence of a complete perimeter fence poses a safety risk as unwanted animals 
and unauthorized persons may have contact with the greater grisons which could result in injury or disease transmission 
to the regulated animals.  
 
Correct by November 12, 2024 by completing the installation of a minimum 6-foot perimeter fence that is distanced at 
least 3 feet from the greater grison primary enclosure or obtain a perimeter fencing variance from the USDA 
Administrator. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
